docs.snippet: U.S. President Barack Obama will come to London in April and urge British voters to back continued membership of the European Union, The Independent on Sunday newspaper reported.
docs.lead_paragraph: U.S. President Barack Obama will come to London in April and urge British voters to back continued membership of the European Union, The Independent on Sunday newspaper reported.

headline.main: Obama to Visit London in Bid to Keep UK in the EU: Report
headline.print_headline: Obama to Visit London in Bid to Keep UK in the EU: Report

docs.snippet: China's Anbang Insurance Group has agreed to acquire Strategic Hotels & Resorts Inc for around $6.5 billion, as the owner of New York's iconic Waldorf Astoria expands its U.S. hotel portfolio, a person briefed on the matter said Saturday.
docs.lead_paragraph: China's Anbang Insurance Group has agreed to acquire Strategic Hotels & Resorts Inc for around $6.5 billion, as the owner of New York's iconic Waldorf Astoria expands its U.S. hotel portfolio, a person briefed on the matter said Saturday.

headline.main: China's Anbang to Acquire Strategic Hotels for $6.5 Billion: Source
headline.print_headline: China's Anbang to Acquire Strategic Hotels for $6.5 Billion: Source

docs.snippet: Police are investigating whether former Russian Press Minister Mikhail Lesin, who was found dead in a Washington hotel in November, was brutally assaulted before returning to the hotel, a U.S. law enforcement source said on Friday.
docs.lead_paragraph: Police are investigating whether former Russian Press Minister Mikhail Lesin, who was found dead in a Washington hotel in November, was brutally assaulted before returning to the hotel, a U.S. law enforcement source said on Friday.

headline.main: Dead Ex-Russian Press Minister May Have Been Attacked Outside Hotel: Source
headline.print_headline: Dead Ex-Russian Press Minister May Have Been Attacked Outside Hotel: Source

docs.snippet: On the London stage, “Welcome Home, Captain Fox!,” “The Maids” and “The Patriotic Traitor.”

headline.main: Review: Plays With Punch, With Roots in France

docs.snippet: Michigan Gov. Rick Snyder's administration has a goal of creating 1,000 new jobs in Flint as a way of helping recover from the ongoing crisis sparked by lead in the city's water.
docs.lead_paragraph: Michigan Gov. Rick Snyder's administration has a goal of creating 1,000 new jobs in Flint as a way of helping recover from the ongoing crisis sparked by lead in the city's water.

headline.main: Snyder Administration Wants 1,000 New Jobs in Flint
headline.print_headline: Snyder Administration Wants 1,000 New Jobs in Flint

docs.snippet: Rebels shot down a Syrian government warplane over western Syria on Saturday, rebels and a military source said, although there were conflicting accounts on whether it had been brought down by a missile or anti-aircraft guns.
docs.lead_paragraph: Rebels shot down a Syrian government warplane over western Syria on Saturday, rebels and a military source said, although there were conflicting accounts on whether it had been brought down by a missile or anti-aircraft guns.

docs.snippet: Fourteen years ago, University of South Dakota anthropology professor Matthew Sayre unearthed pepper tree seed from the southern tip of Peru, unaware he'd stumbled upon a spent ingredient from a small 1,000-year-old brewery.
docs.lead_paragraph: Fourteen years ago, University of South Dakota anthropology professor Matthew Sayre unearthed pepper tree seed from the southern tip of Peru, unaware he'd stumbled upon a spent ingredient from a small 1,000-year-old brewery.

headline.main: Field Museum's Wari Ale the Latest Homage to Ancient Brews
headline.print_headline: Field Museum's Wari Ale the Latest Homage to Ancient Brews

docs.snippet: A Russia Defence Ministry center in Syria received reports on Saturday of Turkish shelling of Kurdish positions in Syria's Aleppo province, RIA news agency reported, while Turkey said it had been targeting Islamic State positions.
docs.lead_paragraph: A Russia Defence Ministry center in Syria received reports on Saturday of Turkish shelling of Kurdish positions in Syria's Aleppo province, RIA news agency reported, while Turkey said it had been targeting Islamic State positions.

headline.main: Russia Says Kurds Shelled From Turkey but Syria Ceasefire Mostly Holds
headline.print_headline: Russia Says Kurds Shelled From Turkey but Syria Ceasefire Mostly Holds

docs.snippet: Slovak Prime Minister Robert Fico's efforts to form a new government got a boost on Saturday after the head of a rival party said it would negotiate with him after all.
docs.lead_paragraph: Slovak Prime Minister Robert Fico's efforts to form a new government got a boost on Saturday after the head of a rival party said it would negotiate with him after all.

headline.main: Slovakian Premier's Hopes of Forming a Coalition Improve
headline.print_headline: Slovakian Premier's Hopes of Forming a Coalition Improve

docs.snippet: Syria's government on Saturday ruled out any discussion of the fate of the presidency at peace talks this week, just as the lead opposition negotiator said a political transition could not even start unless Bashar al-Assad was no longer president.
docs.lead_paragraph: Syria's government on Saturday ruled out any discussion of the fate of the presidency at peace talks this week, just as the lead opposition negotiator said a political transition could not even start unless Bashar al-Assad was no longer president.

headline.main: Government and Opposition Far Apart Over Assad Before Syria Peace Talks
headline.print_headline: Government and Opposition Far Apart Over Assad Before Syria Peace Talks
